The tech, David told me that "shadow people are really just  spirits close =

to materializing" so we can see them.  A few weeks  ago, I saw a small han=
d 
with arm reaching out to touch me on my head, I  jumped up, and hollered=
 at 
it, so it went away quickly.  It wasn't really  scary just startled th=
e heck 
out of me. sf
 
 
In a message dated 1/26/2011 2:19:32 P.M. Eastern=
 Standard Time,  
ashkitty53@... writes:

 
 
 
maybe  zack lol this =
is also at my house which i think is unhaunted as far 
as i know  but i hav=
e exps anything paranormal in the house though i did in 
a house in  kearne=
y mo i saw my first shadow person though it look more like

 From: Zack Widup  <w9sz.zack@...>

I have heard many reports and personally seen in=
 some cases where a person  
on a paranormal investigation experienced rapi=
d, unexplainable battery 
drain.  I myself haven't had it happen to any of =
my batteries. Maybe they avoid  
me!
:-)

Zack

On Wed, Jan 26, 2011 at 1:0=

had anyone had something that use a battery drain in on=

happen to me i was play with my wii with a fully charged =
remote and i was  down 
to 1 bar on my wii i havent even play that much for=

drain i played for 30min total. any one here had simi=
